Html:
Thanks for great tool.

I am waiting for new version with following updates:

1) Silverlight compatibility.

2) Faster graph rendering performance.

4) 3D graph

3) Easier customization for vertex and edge.

4) Edge label support.

5) Flexible interaction between mouse and edge&vertex.

6) Custom layout: position locking for certain edges; position rule (exp, edge A should be on the left of edge B).

7) More stability (less sudden crash).

9) Graphlayout to Image with high quality.

And finally I hope faster version update.

 

Thanks a lot!
